sourcesContent:
export const projects = [
    {
      title: "Payment Tracker",
      subtitle: "MVC/Pair Programming/JS/CSS/MySQL ",
      description:
        "This bill payment tracker app allows users to enter and view information about bills and payments for them, and to schedule reminders for bills that are due soon.",
      image: "./bill.jpg",
      link: "https://s2robertson-payment-tracker-2c1497a835bb.herokuapp.com/",
      repo: "https://github.com/s2robertson/bill-payment-tracker",
      logoGit: `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/github.png`,
      logoWww: "./www.png",
    },
    {
      title: "Code Quiz",
      subtitle: "JavaScript/CSS",
      description:
        "This is a simple quiz app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The app allows users to take a quiz and get a score based on their answers.",
      image: "./quiz.jpg",
      link: "https://gabrielparada05.github.io/Code-Quiz-C4/",
      repo:"https://github.com/gabrielparada05/Code-Quiz-C4",
      logoGit: "./github.png",
      logoWww: "./www.png",
    },
    {
      title: "Password Generator",
      subtitle: "Javascript",
      description:
        "This is a simple web application that generates a random password based on user preferences. The user can select the length of characters and types.",
      image: "./password.jpg",
      link: "https://gabrielparada05.github.io/Password-generator-C3-UofT/",
      repo: "https://github.com/gabrielparada05/Password-generator-C3-UofT",
      logoGit: "./github.png",
      logoWww: "./www.png",
    },
    {
      title: "Weather Dashboard",
      subtitle: "Rest API/CSS/JS/HTML",
      description:
        "This is a weather app that allows users to search for a city and get the current weather and a 5-day forecast for that city. The app uses the OpenWeatherMap API",
      image: "./weather.jpg",
      link: "https://gabrielparada05.github.io/forecast-C6/",
      repo:"https://github.com/gabrielparada05/forecast-C6",
      logoGit: "./github.png",
      logoWww: "./www.png",
    },
    {
      title: "Learning Words",
      subtitle: "Rest API/HTML/CSS/JQuery/Pair Programming",
      description:
        "An interactive web app that lets the user search for words, and it returns words, such as type (noun, verb, etc), definition, and synonyms.",
      image: "./word.jpg",
      link: "https://zaingova.github.io/group-project-learning-words/",
      repo: "https://github.com/zaingova/group-project-learning-words",
      logoGit: "./github.png",
      logoWww: "./www.png",
    },
    {
      title: "API Social Network",
      subtitle: "CRUD/MongoDB/Node",
      description:
        "This is a back-end project built with Mongoose, which serves as the main component of a social media application. ",
      image: "./crud.png",
      repo: "https://github.com/gabrielparada05/Social-Network-API-NoSQL-C18",
      logoGit: "./github.png",
      logoWww: "./www.png",
    },
    {
      title: "CLI Employee Tracker",
      subtitle: "CRUD/MySQL/Express/Node",
      description:
        "This app interacts with a MySQL database to manage employee data. ",
      image: "./crud1.png",
      repo: "https://github.com/gabrielparada05/Employee-Tracker-SQL-C12",
      logoGit: "./github.png",
      logoWww: "./www.png",
    },
    {
      title: "Give Hope",
      subtitle: "GraphQL, React, Apollo Service, Tailwind CSS, Pair Programming",
      description:
        "A purpose driven web application designed to improve sponsor-style fundraising, GiveHope focuses on fundraising based on someone's weekly needs. ",
      image: "./give.jpg",
      repo: "https://github.com/dylansth/give-hope",
      link: "https://givehopedonating-c48150689fc8.herokuapp.com/",
      logoGit: "./github.png",
      logoWww: "./www.png",
    },
  ];
  
  export const skills = [
    {
      id: 1,
      title: "JavaScript",
      image: "./js.png"
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      title: "HTML",
      image: "./html.png"
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      title: "CSS",
      image: "./css.png"
    },
    {
      id: 4,
      title: "React",
      image: "./react.png"
    },
    {
      id: 5,
      title: "Node",
      image: "./node-js.png"
    },
    {
      id: 6,
      title: "SQL",
      image: "./database.png"
    },
    {
      id: 7,
      title: "NoSQL",
      image: "./images/agile.png"
    },
    {
      id: 8,
      title: "Restful API",
      image: "./api.png"
    },
    {
      id: 9,
      title: "PWA",
      image: "./pwa.png"
    },
    {
      id: 10,
      title: "MVC",
      image: "./mvc.png"
    },
    {
      id: 11,
      title: "Github",
      image: "./github.png"
    },
    {
      id: 12,
      title: "Agile",
      image: "../../images/logo-png.png"
    },
    {
      id: 13,
      title: "GraphQL",
      image: "./graph.png"
    },
  ];
